General.Name: Pavonine Co Ltd
General.Description: Pavonine Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum TVs, medical devices, and home appliances in South Korea and rest of Asia. The company offers TV frames and stand; digital signage billboards; and medical equipment, such as digital and portable digital x-ray, and ventilators. It also engages in the software development and other activities. The company was formerly known as EO Precision Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pavonine Co., Ltd. in December 2002. Pavonine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
